about_the_game:
Autogiro: An Exciting Adventure in Helicopter Shooting

In Autogiro, a fast-paced, side-scrolling shooter, you take control of a sophisticated helicopter and set off on a mission where your survival depends on your accuracy, quick thinking, and strategy! You will enter a high-security system as a proficient helicopter pilot, evading lethal obstacles, fighting waves of opponents, and taking on formidable bosses in four difficult zones.

Key Features:

Exciting Side-Scrolling Action: Make your way through dangerous areas teeming with hostile troops, lethal traps, and narrow passageways. Each level offers a fresh difficulty that must be solved with lightning-fast reflexes and quick thought.

Epic Boss Battles: There is an epic battle with a terrifying boss at the end of each of the four zones. To go on to the next level and eventually engage the base boss in a memorable final battle, defeat them.

Management of Fuel: Pay attention to your fuel levels! Restock your supplies by dropping bombs on gasoline tanks, but don't get side-tracked—you'll need every drop to make it to the last zone.

Smooth, Dynamic Controls: Whether you're using a keyboard or a controller, learn how to accelerate and decelerate using simple controls. In the heat of combat, maintain your agility and adjust to confined areas and fast-paced pursuits.

Are You Able to Finish the Mission?

Autogiro is not a game for the weak of heart, with only three lives and unrelenting foes at every step. Are you capable of surviving perilous terrain, taking down imposing bosses, and reaching the decisive battle?

The sky is your battlefield, pilot, so get ready.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not 100% accurate. This game should run on most machines.

name: Autogiro

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not 100% accurate. This game should run on most machines.
